docs.summary:
The General Info API contains functionality for getting
 [your site's properties](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-your-sites-business-info)
 from backend code.
description: To use the generalInfo API, import `wixSite` from the `wix-site-backend` module:

Rejected - Error message.
